constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: NEIPOL Name: MC1  Maldens and Coombe
AIRCZ Type:: Gatwick Airport Wind Turbine Consultation Zone:Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Gatwick Airport Limited, 7th Floor Destinations Place, London Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH06 0NP

description: Erection of hip to gable and rear dormer roof extensions and installation of 2x front velux windows to facilitate loft conversion.
decision_conditions: The erection of hip to gable and rear dormer roof extensions and installation of 2x front velux windows to facilitate loft conversion falls within the parameters of permitted development as set out under Schedule 2, Part 1, Class B and C of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).
Condition 6 (CO2 reductions/water useage) - Officers have reviewed the information provided and are satisfied this can now be approved.

Site location plan must show red outline - please correct and re-submitPlease submit a copy of an Ordnance Survey based site location plan scaled 1:1250 with the application site outlined in red and adjoining land owned by applicant in blue, showing at least two road frontages and a North point.
